metadata.title: CVE-2022-48948 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  usb: gadget: uvc: Prevent buffer overflow in setup handler  Setup function uvc_function_setup permits control transfer requests with up to 64 bytes of payload (UVC_MAX_REQUEST_SIZE), data stage handler for OUT transfer uses memcpy to copy req->actual bytes to uvc_event->data.data array of size 60. This may result in an overflow of 4 bytes.
